{{{
String say(String from, String msg, [String device='carrer pidgeon', String mood]) {
  var result = "$from says $msg";
  if (device != null) {
    result = "$result with a $device";
  }
  if (mood != null) {
    result = "$result (in a $mood mood)";
  }
  return result;
}
